metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26310 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Pandora FMS v7.0NG.760 and below allows an improper authorization in UserManagement where any authenticated user with access to the User Managementmodule could create, modify or delete any user with full admin privilege.The impact could lead to a vertical privilege escalation to access theprivileges of a higher-level user or typically an admin user.

criterions.comment: pandorafms-agent package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
